com.constantcontact.webhooks
Class CTCTWebhookUtil

java.lang.Object
  com.constantcontact.webhooks.CTCTWebhookUtil

public class CTCTWebhookUtil
extends java.lang.Object

Main Webhook Utility class.
This is meant to be used by users to validate and parse Webhooks received from ConstantContact.

Author:
ConstantContact

getBillingChangeNotification

public BillingChangeNotification getBillingChangeNotification(java.lang.String xCtctHmacSHA256,
                                                              java.lang.String bodyMessage)
                                                       throws ConstantContactException,
                                                              java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException
Get Billing Change Notification.
Validates and parses the bodyMessage into BillingChangeNotification

Parameters:
xCtctHmacSHA256 - The value in the x-ctct-hmac-sha256 header.
bodyMessage - The body message from the POST received from ConstantContact in Webhook callback.
Returns:
The BillingChangeNotification object corresponding to bodyMessage in case of success; an exception is thrown otherwise.
Throws:
java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException - Thrown when the encryption algorithm used for validation is not available. Should not happen.
ConstantContactException - Thrown when :
  • message encryption does not correspond with x-ctct-hmac-sha256 header value;
  • or an error is raised when parsing the bodyMessage.

Error message is taken from one of the members of Config.Errors

isValidWebhook

public boolean isValidWebhook(java.lang.String xCtctHmacSHA256,
                              java.lang.String bodyMessage)
                       throws ConstantContactException,
                              java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException
Validates a Webhook message.

Parameters:
xCtctHmacSHA256 - The value in the x-ctct-hmac-sha256 header.
bodyMessage - The body message from the POST received from ConstantContact in Webhook callback.
Returns:
true if in case of success; false if the Webhook is invalid.
Throws:
java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException - Thrown when the encryption algorithm used for validation is not available. Should not happen.
ConstantContactException - Thrown when: message encryption does not correspond with x-ctct-hmac-sha256 header value.
Error message is taken from one of the members of Config.Errors
